item.title: BTLO Incident Response Case Study: Pranoid
item.description: Executive Summary A forensic review of Linux auditd logs confirms that the host was compromised through an external SSH brute-force attack. The attacker authenticated as a low-privileged user, executed automated system enumeration, escalated privileges using a local sudo vulnerability, accessed sensitive credential material, and attempted basic anti-forensic cleanup. The entire intrusion lifecycle occurred within approximately six minutes. Scope and Evidence Primary artifact: audit.log (Linux auditd) Tools used: aureport ausearch Manual timeline correlation Observed timeframe:
